flawed_nl_solution:
Greta the goose eats 20/10=<<20/10=2.0>>2.0 pounds of food per day.
Milton the mouse eats (1/100)*2.0=0.2 of a pound of food per day.
Elmer the elephant eats 4000*(0.2)=<<4000*(0.2)=800.0>>800.0 pounds of food per day.
Thus, Elmer eats 800.0-20=780.0 pounds more food per day than does Penelope the pig.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.02, not 0.2. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
